WizardLevel6Spells.Name: Chain Lightning
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: You create a bolt of lightning that arcs toward a target of your choice that you can see within range.

WizardLevel6Spells.Name: Circle of Death
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: A sphere of negative energy ripples out in a 60-foot-radius sphere from a point within range.

WizardLevel6Spells.Name: Contingency
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: Choose a spell of 5th level or lower that you can cast, that has a casting time of 1 action, and that can target you.

WizardLevel6Spells.Name: Create Undead
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: You can cast this spell only at night.

WizardLevel6Spells.Name: Disintegrate
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: A thin green ray springs from your pointing finger to a target that you can see within range.

WizardLevel6Spells.Name: Eyebite
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: For the spell's duration, your eyes become an inky void imbued with dread power.

WizardLevel6Spells.Name: Flesh to Stone
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: You attempt to turn one creature that you can see within range into stone.

WizardLevel6Spells.Name: Freezing Sphere
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: A frigid globe of cold energy streaks from your fingertips to a point of your choice within range.

WizardLevel6Spells.Name: Globe of Invulnerability
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: An immobile, faintly shimmering barrier springs into existence in a 10-foot radius around you and remains for the duration.

WizardLevel6Spells.Name: Guards and Wards
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: You create a ward that protects up to 2,500 square feet of floor space (an area 50 feet square, or one hundred 5-foot squares or twenty-five 10-foot squares).

WizardLevel6Spells.Name: Instant Summons
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: You touch an object weighing 10 pounds or less whose longest dimension is 6 feet or less.

WizardLevel6Spells.Name: Irresistible Dance
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: Choose one creature that you can see within range.

WizardLevel6Spells.Name: Magic Jar
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: Your body falls into a catatonic state as your soul leaves it and enters the container you used for the spell's material component.

WizardLevel6Spells.Name: Mass Suggestion
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence up to twelve creatures of your choice that you can see within range and that can hear and understand you.

WizardLevel6Spells.Name: Move Earth
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: Choose an area of terrain no larger than 40 feet on a side within range.

WizardLevel6Spells.Name: Programmed Illusion
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: You create an illusion of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon within range that activates when a specific condition occurs.

WizardLevel6Spells.Name: Sunbeam
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: A beam of brilliant light flashes out from your hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line.

WizardLevel6Spells.Name: True Seeing
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: This spell gives the willing creature you touch the ability to see things as they actually are.

WizardLevel6Spells.Name: Wall of Ice
WizardLevel6Spells.Description: You create a wall of ice on a solid surface within range.
